oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ambrotype of Washington, a Bradley County slave
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is an ambrotype of a Bradley County slave named "Washington" holding a spotted beagle. He was sold by John Henderson of Bradley County, Tennessee. to John Fain of Union County, Georgia in 1855. The bill of sale for this transaction is (brad008). Washington was then, in 1855, of 10-12 years of age and warranted to be "sound, healthy and sensible, and a slave for life."
